alright so after downloading it with Utorrent all i did to get the game playing was take the crack and move it to C:UsersYourNameHereDownloadsDarksiders 2. Thats all I did in order to get it running. just use the Darksiders 2 application afterwards and hopefully it will work. Warning, although the game doesn't take a strong comp to run it, there isn't much to change the graphics settings except resolution and v-sync. If i'm wrong about the last part, my bad.

3. Run as administrator.
